features: POWER MIST DYE FREE 3-PACK: Contains Touchland's mood-boosting scents Rainwater, Beach Coco and also our Unscented version; Each mist provides 500-sprays of hand hydration and hygiene

HYDRATING, SCENTED FORMULA: Say goodbye to overbearing alcohol-smelling, sticky hand sanitizer; Each mist is made with mood-boosting scents and functional ingredients for pleasant and effective day-to-day protection

WITH ALOE VERA & LEMON ESSENTIAL OIL: Our unique formula is not only fast-absorbing, it also kills 99.9% of harmful germs while leaving hands feeling smooth and soft to the touch; Plus it's vegan and cruelty-free

HOW TO USE: Spray enough product in your palm to thoroughly cover hands and rub together; This micro-mist is great to use before eating, on public transportation, in public restrooms, and when touching cash
AWARD-WINNING PRODUCTS: The most awarded hand sanitizer by Allure's Best of Beauty, InStyle, Esquire, Glamour, Cosmopolitan, Byrdie, Hello Giggles, New You and more

What makes Power Mist so special? Our Power Mist hand sanitizer has a hydrating formulation that leaves hands moisturized & soft while eliminating 99.99% of most harmful germs & bacteria. It’s not sticky & it’s fast absorbing. Plus, it comes in 15 uplifting scents! How long does it last & what are the benefits? Our mist contains 500+ sprays and is also packed with good-for-you ingredients that leave hands soft, hydrated, & smelling great. Are the containers refillable? Currently, our mists are not refillable due to the high risk of cross-contamination. However, we are working on a refillable option that eliminates the risk of cross-contamination. Can I bring this on a plane in my carry-on luggage? Each passenger on a flight may carry liquids, gels, and aerosols in travel-size containers that are 3.4 fl oz (100mL). We have created our product to not only be pocket-friendly but also TSA-friendly, with it being only 1.0 fl oz (30mL). Is it Vegan & Cruelty-free? What is the alcohol %? Does it contain any FDA banned ingredients? Our Power Mist formulation is vegan & cruelty-free. It contains 70% ethyl alcohol which eliminates 99.99% of most common germs and bacteria. Moreover, It does NOT include harmful ingredients such as Triclosan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient, and Convenient!
reviews.reviewText: Touchland Spray Hand Sanitizer has become my go-to choice for keeping my hands clean and germ-free. One of the things I appreciate most about them is that they're not filled with glitter and color like some other hand sanitizers on the market. The compact design makes it incredibly convenient to carry in my bag or pocket, ensuring that I always have it on hand whenever I need it. The spray mechanism delivers just the right amount of sanitizer with each pump, allowing for efficient coverage without any mess or waste. The variety of refreshing scents adds a pleasant touch to the sanitizing experience, making it a joy to use throughout the day. Plus, the formula is fast-drying and non-sticky, leaving my hands feeling fresh and moisturized. If you're looking for a reliable hand sanitizer that combines efficiency, convenience, and a glitter-free experience, look no further than Touchland Spray Hand Sanitizer. It's a must-have essential for daily hygiene!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This hand sanitizer feels SO NICE. It smells amazing, feels hydrating and looks great! Also to mention, it's sleek and fits in your pocket so easily. I know it's a bit expensive for hand sanitizer but to me, it's 100% worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Touchland Power Mist Hydrating Hand Sanitizer Spray - A Burst of Hydration and Joy!
reviews.reviewText: Let me introduce you to a game-changer in the world of hand sanitizers - the Touchland Power Mist Hydrating Hand Sanitizer Spray, JUICY 3-PACK. These little wonders have transformed the mundane act of hand sanitizing into a delightful ritual. Here's why they're not just hand sanitizers but an experience of joy and wellness:Powerful Hydration in a Spray:Each mist in this 3-pack delivers a whopping 500 sprays of hand hydration. Yes, you read that right! Not only do they keep your hands clean, but they also keep them incredibly soft and moisturized. It's like a spa treatment for your hands in a handy spray bottle.A Symphony of Scents:Say goodbye to the overwhelming smell of alcohol that's often associated with hand sanitizers. Touchland has partnered with Givaudan to create 13 mood-boosting scents, including Wild Watermelon, Velvet Peach, and Berry Bliss in this pack. Every spray is an aromatic journey that elevates your senses and boosts your mood.With Aloe Vera & Lemon Essential Oil:While these mists are busy killing 99.9% of germs, they're also pampering your hands with the goodness of aloe vera and lemon essential oil. Your hands will feel pampered, soft, and luxuriously smooth after every use.Easy to Use, Anytime, Anywhere:Using these mists is a breeze. Just spray enough product in your palm to thoroughly cover your hands, rub them together, and voilà! They're perfect for pre-meal use, public transportation, public restrooms, and handling cash. They're the perfect on-the-go companions for cleanliness and freshness.Award-Winning Formula:Don't just take my word for it; these mists have garnered recognition from industry experts. They're the most awarded hand sanitizers, earning accolades from Allure's Best Beauty, Instyle, Esquire, Hello Giggles, New You, New Beauty Award, and more.More Than Just Sanitizers:What sets Power Mist apart is its transformative approach to personal care. It's not just about sanitizing; it's about embracing joy and pleasure in self-care. It's an experience that elevates the everyday into a sensory, essential ritual.In conclusion, the Touchland Power Mist Hydrating Hand Sanitizer Spray isn't your ordinary hand sanitizer; it's a touch of magic, a burst of joy, and a dose of wellness in a sleek little bottle. Whether you're traveling, at work, or simply out and about, these mists are your trusted companions for clean, soft, and blissfully scented hands. Say goodbye to the ordinary and welcome the Touchland experience into your life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love them, worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: I love these sanitizers! they are compact and feel great! they are perfect office gifts also!These do not dry my hands and they smell great! love them!~~

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the girl on the go!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these originally because I'd heard the hype from people on TikTok, and I have to admit, they're really worth the hype! The scents are fantastic and they leave my hands feeling moisturized in a way that I can't imagine living without now that I've tried the Touchland hand sanitizers! They're so small they'll fit in just about any purse. They are a staple in my bags from here on out! I got the Juicy 3-Pack and I've been thrilled with all the scents. None of them are overpowering, and they don't smell artificial at all. It's like you're smelling a real fruit! I don't know how they do it, but the scent is wonderfully realistic and long-lasting.I will definitely be purchasing it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells nothing like alcohol sanitizer which I love
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- doesn’t smell like alcohol, so you don’t feel like you’re dumping a margarita on your hands every time you need to sanitize (see: Trader Joe’s hand sani)- lots of fragrance options- trendy cute bottle which looks aesthetic af in your bag, in the car, great for gifting for its usefulness + added cuteness- performance of spray isn’t concentrated but wide nozzle to cover more surface area-feels good to hold in your hand-no issues with leakage so far!CONS:-expensive (imo) it says 500 sprays in a bottle but…-I find I need 3-4 sprays at a time to cover the whole surface area of my hand 🤷🏼‍♀️It didn’t change my life - but I would be stoked if a friend gifted me a pack of these down be road and they’re also great stocking stuffers with the holidays coming up and are definitely non-drying as opposed to other sanitizers on the market! I’ll probably buy more lol the product design got me more than anything 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Once you try it, you'll be hooked!
reviews.reviewText: I received as a gift and totally loved it! Small enough to fit in my clutch, just enough enjoyable fragrance along with a nice feeling of safe & clean. Once my watermelon Touchland gift was gone, I ordered more ASAP. The Beach Coco smells great too. The price felt high, but once you try this product, you'll see it's a good value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Hand Sanitizer
reviews.reviewText: My thirteen year old grandson introduced these to me. They have become my favorites for several reasons: easy to carry in my purse, easy to use and they don’t sting my skin. Dries quickly and smells wonderful. My husband is “hooked” too!
